definitions.text: any foodstuff made by combining different ingredients
examples: he volunteered to taste her latest concoction
he drank a mixture of beer and lemonade

definitions.text: an occurrence of an unusual mixture
examples: it suddenly spewed out a thick green concoction

definitions.text: the invention of a scheme or story to suit some purpose
examples: she has no peer in the concoction of mystery stories

definitions.text: the act of creating something (a medicine or drink or soup etc.) by compounding or mixing a variety of components
